name: The Verilyen Prison Break
description:
Currently no endings and also extremely buggy

This is an early version of the game that I'm making for a final project in one of my college courses. 

It's a visual novel that takes place in a world we created in class. The world is a solarpunk island based world where every island has a life tree that sustains it. Each tree is district and is powered by a sort of radioactive element. Every character and background is all generated by AI using NightCafe and is currently roughly halfway through what I want to turn in.

The story takes place on the island of Verilyen which is dominated by a giant red wood tree and it follows the perspective of a pickpocket named Mashy who's contracted to break an infamous man out of the castle dungeon.
